name: The Trail (itch) (McFrostyBoy)
description: The times have changed, the Styx has run dry, and most gods are either dead or forgotten. Join the newly reincarnated Hermes as she rides shotgun with the veteran Charon in The Trail, an adventure card game where the Player guides a stagecoach caravan of souls through the trials of the afterlife. The journey is hard, and as always, will test the limits of their abilities as they battle the odds to guide their ghostly charges to their final destination.
